random:rainbowify.description: Creates a rainbowified/party-fied gif from an image for slack

useGifIntermediateFrames.name: useGifIntermediateFrames
useGifIntermediateFrames.description: Whether or not to add intermediate frames to gifs to keep the fast rainbow effect. Can increase the size of the gif.

saturation.name: saturation
saturation.description: Saturation level to apply to each frame

lighten.name: lighten
lighten.description: Lightening level to apply to each frame

size.name: size
size.description: Squared size of the output image (scaled to fit)

adventofcode:2022:day1:max-sum.description: Given a list of groups of numbers, calculates the top groups with the highest total and returns their sum. https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/2

file.name: file
file.description: A file containing groups of numbers. Numbers are one per line and groups are separated by empty lines.

top.name: top
top.description: The number of maximum values to take and sum together.

adventofcode:2022:day2:rock-paper-scisso.description: Given a list of pairs of one player's rock, paper, scissors choices and the desired result, calculate the scores for each players. https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/2#part2

file.name: file
file.description: A file containing pairs of encoded rock, paper, scissors games. Each game is a line. One encoded letter representing player selection and one encoded letter representing the desired result per line

adventofcode:2022:day2:rock-paper-scisso.description: Given a list of pairs of head to head rock paper scissors, calculate the score for both players. https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/2

file.name: file
file.description: A file containing pairs of encoded rock, paper, scissors games. Each game is a line. Two encoded letters representing player selections per line

adventofcode:2022:day3:rucksack-duplicat.description:
Given a list of items per rucksack, find the items that exist in both compartments and score them on priority: https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/3
Also finds the badge to label the rucksacks with. Rucksacks are grouped into sets of three and the badge can be identified as the only item contained in all three: https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/3#part2

file.name: file
file.description: A file containing the items in each rucksack. Each line is a rucksack, each letter is an item. Each rucksack has a variable number of compartments (but all have the same number).

compartmentsPerRucksack.name: compartmentsPerRucksack
compartmentsPerRucksack.description: The number of compartments per rucksack. Defaults to 2.

adventofcode:2022:day4:camp-cleanup-over.description: Given pairs of ranges of cleaning zones, find the number with overlapped sections: https://adventofcode.com/2022/day/4

file.name: file
file.description: A file containing pairs of numerical ranges. One pair per line.
